
```{r}
impervious_fractions <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

volume <- predict_runoff(impervious_fraction = impervious_fractions, watershed_area = 182)

```

```{r}
impervious_fractions <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)
print(impervious_fractions)

```

```{r}
runoff_df <- data.frame(impervious_fractions, volume)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = runoff_df, aes(x = impervious_fractions, y = volume)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(color = "purple") +
  labs(title = "Volume against impervious fraction",
       x = "Impervious fractions",
       y = "Volume")
```
